description:
Do you have experience working in the solar space?

Are you geared for a new challenge this year and looking to pivot into a company that is looking to expand rapidly?

Quotacom have partnered with an innovative solar start-up who are gearing up for explosive growth in 2024. They are seeking a dynamic Sales Director to lead the charge into new territories.

This is an opportunity to be part of a visionary team driving sustainable solutions and shaping the future of solar energy.

Responsibilities:
• Spearhead the development and execution of strategic sales plans to drive new business and partnerships within the solar sector.
• Build and lead a high-performing sales team, fostering a culture of excellence and achievement.
• Identify and engage key stakeholders in the solar industry, cultivating lasting partnerships.
• Drive revenue growth by expanding our solar product and service offerings.
• Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to align sales efforts with overall business objectives.

Requirements:
• 5+ years of proven experience in a leadership role within the solar industry.
• Demonstrated success in generating new business and creating strategic partnerships.
• Track record of building, leading and motivating high-performing sales teams.
• In-depth understanding of the solar market, trends, and key players.
• Strong communication and negotiation skills, with the ability to influence at all levels.

At Quotacom, we take the security and privacy of your personal data very seriously, any data we hold will be in accordance with data protection legislation. Full details of our privacy notice can be found at https://quotacom.com/privacy-policy/
